ch.pschatzmann.scad4j.ISCAD

  • Packages that use ISCAD 
    Package Description
    ch.pschatzmann.scad4j
    Basic API
    ch.pschatzmann.scad4j.actions
    Implementation of Actions on Objects
    ch.pschatzmann.scad4j.d1
    Generic Objects which are not 2D or 3D objects

    Implementation of 2 Dimensional Objects

    Implementation of 3 Dimensional Objects

    Convert SCAD files to other formats

    • Uses of ISCAD in ch.pschatzmann.scad4j.actions

      Classes in ch.pschatzmann.scad4j.actions that implement ISCAD 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ActionColor
      Displays the child elements using the specified RGB color + alpha value.
      class  ActionDifference
      difference() on objects
      class  ActionGroup
      Operation involving multiple objects
      class  ActionHull
      Displays the convex hull of child nodes.
      class  ActionInclude  
      class  ActionIntersection
      intersection() on objects
      class  ActionLinearExtrude
      Linear extrude on a 2D object
      class  ActionMinkowski
      minkowski() operation on multiple obects
      class  ActionMirror  
      class  ActionMultimatrix
      Multiplies the geometry of all child elements with the given 4x4 transformation matrix.
      class  ActionOffset  
      class  ActionProjection  
      class  ActionRender  
      class  ActionResize
      Modifies the size of the child object to match the given x,y, and z.
      class  ActionRotate
      Rotates its child 'a' degrees about the axis of the coordinate system or around an arbitrary axis.
      class  ActionRotateExtrude
      Rotational extrusion spins a 2D shape around the Z-axis to form a solid which has rotational symmetry.
      class  ActionScale  
      class  ActionTransform  
      class  ActionTranslate  
      class  ActionUnion  
      class  ObjectSourceAction
      Management of source object

    • Uses of ISCAD in ch.pschatzmann.scad4j.d2

      Classes in ch.pschatzmann.scad4j.d2 that implement ISCAD 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Circle
      Creates a circle at the origin.
      class  Ellipse
      An ellipse can be created from a circle by using either scale() or resize() to make the x and y dimensions unequal.
      class  Polygon
      Creates a multiple sided shape from a list of x,y coordinates.
      class  RegularPolygon
      A regular polygon of 3 or more sides can be created by using circle() with $fn set to the number of sides.
      class  Square
      Creates a square or rectangle in the first quadrant.
      class  Text
      Output of Text
      Methods in ch.pschatzmann.scad4j.d2 that return ISCAD 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ISCAD ICircleCommon.minimumAngle​(java.lang.Object minimumAngle)  
      ISCAD ICircleCommon.minimumCircumferentialLength​(java.lang.Object minimumCircumferentialLength)  
      ISCAD ICircleCommon.numberOfFragments​(java.lang.Object numberOfFragments)  

    • Uses of ISCAD in ch.pschatzmann.scad4j.d3

      Classes in ch.pschatzmann.scad4j.d3 that implement ISCAD 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Cube
      Creates a cube in the first octant.
      class  Cylinder
      Creates a cylinder or cone centered about the z axis.
      class  Polyhedron
      A polyhedron is the most general 3D primitive solid.
      class  Sphere
      Creates a sphere at the origin of the coordinate system.
